Class HtmlFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • HtmlComponent
      • HtmlFragment

  • public class HtmlFragment
extends HtmlComponent
    A single element of HTML to be rendered by a HtmlCanvas, containing String, Font and a Color. In general, do not create these directly; a HtmlPrinter will create and render them.
    Since:
    October 21st, 2016
    Author:
    Ofek Gila, Saagar Jha
    See Also:
    HtmlComponent, HtmlCanvas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HtmlFragment(java.lang.String text, java.awt.Font font, java.awt.Color color, javax.swing.JComponent component)
      Constructs a HtmlFragment with the provided values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAscent()
      Returns the ascent (the distance typical from the baseline to the top of characters) of this HtmlFragment, in pixels based on its Font.
      java.awt.Font getFont()
      Returns the Font that this HtmlFragment uses to render its text.
      java.lang.String getText()
      Returns the text of this HtmlFragment.

                    java.awt.Font font,

        Constructs a HtmlFragment with the provided values.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display
        font - The Font to use
        color - The Color to use
        component - The JComponent this text will will rendered on, to generate FontMetrics
